name: Tiny Death
description:
Control the Tiny Death and help him become the great Reaper.
Jump, scythe and use the environment to reach your objective: get rid of all the souls you may find on your way and throw them into the Refrigerium.
Are your strong enough to become the Death?

• A wonderful Free-To-Play platformer
• Amazing HD graphics
• 80 different levels in 4 unique environments
• Leaderboards via Game Center
• 10 helpful boosts
